title: (x) Conde Nast logo: Hi-contrast Didone w/ small caps - Linotype Didot {Florian}
content:
Help with the name of this typeface. Thank you.

[http://www.mediabistro.com/fishbowlny/original/key\_art\_conde\_nast\_digita...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012212449/http:/www.mediabistro.com/fishbowlny/original/key_art_conde_nast_digital.jpg "http://www.mediabistro.com/fishbowlny/original/key\_art\_conde\_nast\_digital.jpg")
author: • Type ID Board [OLD]

comments.content:
Looks like Bodoni to me.

Patrick

While [LTC Bodoni 175](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012212449/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/lanston_type_co/ltc_bodoni_175_small_caps/?&sample_text=Cond%C3%A9%20Nast) offers the advantage of true small caps, I think this is rather [Linotype Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012212449/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/linotype-didot/bold/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D28%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DCOND%25C3%2589%2520NAST%2520DIGITAL%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D32), with faux small caps (and a custom acute).  
F
